name: Steel & Bone
description:
Story

You are a contract monster hunter tasked with clearing a mysterious aristocrat's dungeon, but you find the contract a much harder task than you previously thought it was...

Features

- Classes with different abilities
- Different weapons.
- Stealth mechanics.
- Bosses.
- Puzzles.
- Deadly traps.

And much, much more...

Credits

Steel & Bone is made by first-year game development students at Ahlman Institute and was made over approximately 3 months.
